Types

ShellError = ref object of OSError
  cmd*: string                 ## Command that returned non-zero exit code
  cwd*: string                 ## Absolute path of initial command execution directory
  retcode*: int                ## Exit code
  errstr*: string              ## Stderr for command
  outstr*: string              ## Stdout for command

Procs

proc printShellError() {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
proc runShell(command: string; doRaise: bool = true): tuple[stdout, stderr: string,
    code: int] {...}{.raises: [OSError, Exception, Defect, IOError, ShellError, ValueError],
               tags: [ExecIOEffect, ReadEnvEffect, RootEffect, ReadIOEffect].}

Iterators

iterator iterstdout(command: string): string {...}{.
    raises: [OSError, Exception, Defect, IOError],
    tags: [ExecIOEffect, ReadEnvEffect, RootEffect, ReadIOEffect].}

template withDir(dir: string; body: untyped): untyped
